title: Two- Story 2 Bed 2 Bath with office, In-unit Laundry, Dishwasher
posting_body: Two- Story 2 Bed 2 Bath with office, In-unit Laundry, Dishwasher Roscoe Village
Listing ID #: 6143
Address: 1834 MELROSE, #2R
Price: $2,395
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 2.0
Be sure to ask us for the video tour of this unique and spacious two- story Roscoe Village Duplex Coach house, available now.
2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms along with bonus office and amazing closet space throughout.
In-unit washer and dryer are located on the second floor along with the bedrooms-
no lugging your laundry up and down the stairs!
High ceilings on the main level and original details throughout.
Enjoy central A/C and shared yard access this summer.
Live less than 3 blocks from Whole Foods, Target, and your new favorite bars and restaurants.
A short walk to Hamlin Park and plenty of public transit options with easy street parking.
$39.95 fee per applicant for credit/background check.
One month security deposit required.
Pets are considered on a case by case basis.
Additional $250 pet fee required.
